parameters.name: FilePathName
parameters.description: Path and file name for the SOLIDWORKS document

title: ISldWorks.IGetConfigurationNames
description: Gets the names of the configuration in this SOLIDWORKS document, whether the document is opened or closed.
signature:
System.String IGetConfigurationNames( 
   System.String
FilePathName
,
   System.Int32
Count
)

parameters.name: FilePathName
parameters.description: Path and file name for the SOLIDWORKS document

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of strings containing the names of the configurations in this SOLIDWORKS document VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISldWorks::GetConfigurationCount
to get the value for Count.
